title: Day 15 - Laughing Jack
itunes:title: Day 15 - Laughing Jack
itunes:subtitle: The Bad Days
description:
There is a simple joy in hearing that your child has a new friend. Especially when the child hasn't had many friends growing up. but when that friend turns out to be something else entirely, the real horror begins...

Warning: this story contains descriptions of violence that includes children

***

Credited to user SnuffBomb on creepypasta.org

***

Story has been edited from it's original version to update the narrator and some minor grammatical changes

***
